snippet: The chief of Gawker Media, and king of traffic-trawling online journalism, sent a memo to the staff extolling the virtues of well-turned narratives and "authentic opinion."

headline.main: Nick Denton, Relentless Seeker of Online Traffic, Turns Sentimental About Writing
